title: WATCH: Trump Gets Out Near Trump International Hotel to Walk in Inaugural Parade
text:
If you were wondering when President Donald Trump would first get out of his vehicle and walk in his inaugural parade, well wait no longer.

As the parade approached the DC hotel that bears his name, Trump International Hotel, Trump, his wife Melania and son Barron exited their car and walked for a short distance, waving to the crowd.

After a bit of a stroll, the newly inaugurated POTUS and family entered back into their vehicles.

Watch the clip above.

[image via screengrab]
